action-group.diy-instructions: *** NOTE: If you are installing via Automod you may skip to step 2 *** 1. Make all edits to all files and upload them to your forum. 2. Browse to the file mchat_install.php in the root of your forum to make the database changes (eg, http://mysite.com/mchat_install.php). 3. Delete the mchat_install.php file from the root of your forum. 4. Refresh the style, theme and purge the cache in the ACP, set the settings for the Mini Chat under the ".Mods" tab. 5. Visit user/group permissions and set the permissions for the Mini Chat for your groups/users. 6. Enjoy the Mod!!
